item.description:
Single Mingle at Lucky's Lounge - Don't let the picture scare you - its wonderful inside !

No cover - let's just meet and hang out to some great live Jazz and a Sinatra imitator - and he's pretty damn good!

Luckys has a great menu and reasonably priced drinks. The venue is very bohemian and conducive to our kind of event.

Use your GPS or online map to find the place. There is no signage on the road so you have to watch the building numbers.

Luckys is in the cellar of 355 Congress St (on the corner of Congress and A Street) SEE PHOTO !!!
http://www.luckysloun...
item.how_to_find_us: In the lower bar - look for the Single Mingle Flags on the tables (in the back)

group.name: Boston Metro Hike Bike & Social Club

item.name: Singles & Sinatra at Lucky's Lounge
